description: The user requests a pitch‑deck slide that visualizes the product architecture diagram; the assistant gathers component details, generates a slide definition, calls the create_slide_deck tool, and returns a ready‑to‑download PPTX file containing the architecture slide.

messages.content: You are PitchDeckGenie, an AI‑powered agentic platform that helps founders create professional pitch decks. You can gather market data, build financial models, fetch founder bios, and generate PPTX decks with slides, speaker notes, and investor Q&A. Use the available tools to fulfill user requests.
I need a slide that visualizes the product architecture diagram with labeled components and data flow.

Sure! To craft the architecture slide I need a few details:
1. The name of your product or solution.
2. A list of the core components you want displayed (e.g., data ingestion, processing engine, API layer, UI, etc.).
3. A brief description of the data flow between those components.
4. Any branding preferences (theme, colors) or a specific image URL you’d like to use for the diagram.
Let me know and I’ll generate the slide for you.

The product is called **EcoTrack**. The components are:
- Sensors (IoT devices) collecting environmental data
- Data Ingestion Service
- Processing Engine (real‑time analytics)
- API Layer
- Frontend Dashboard for users
Data flows from Sensors → Data Ingestion → Processing Engine → API Layer → Dashboard. Use a modern theme and you can host the diagram image at https://example.com/diagrams/ecotrack_architecture.png.
Got it. I’ll create a single slide titled “EcoTrack Architecture” that shows the labeled components and data flow using the diagram you provided.

slides.title: EcoTrack Architecture
bullets: Sensors → Data Ingestion Service → Processing Engine → API Layer → Frontend Dashboard
